title: Houston Police Chief Comms Re: Food Not Bombs

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All communications to or from Chief Troy Finner, including text messages and emails, between Jan. 1, 2023 and July 24, 2023 containing any of the following terms: "food not bombs", "Charitable Feeding Ordinance", "61 Riesner" or "library".

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

CJ Ciaramella

title: Incident report for 2005 Campbell County High shooting

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: Incident report for 2005 Campbell County High shooting
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The incident report and any supplements, such as police narratives, produced in relation to the shooting incident at Campbell County High School on 11/8/2005.

In the event that there are fees, I would request a waiver, as I am a member of a nonprofit media outlet and these records will be used in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. 

I would prefer the request filed electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Julian Wray.
